channel.title: [317] Auto-Donator In-Game [317]
channel.description: I'm wondering how do the big servers make donations automatically effect your character in-game? What is it that does this? How do I do it for 317's? Take DFScape for example, all you do is donate and BOOM you got your points to buy things with, and your title. I want to know how to do this, I'm pretty sure it has something to do with php/sql. Post it in the tutorials section, because then everyone can do it, rather than PM me or reply. Thanks, to all who attempt to help, in advance.

item.title: [317] Auto-Donator In-Game [317]
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

Thank you, now all I need is the PHP, anyone help?

BTW this needs to work with paypal.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Auto-Donator In-Game [317]
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

sjustin1996:

But how do I get mysql to register it with the site and then put it in-game?

You dont have MYSQL. You have “cfg” files I am assuming. Which store all your players information. So you will need to create a PHP script that edits the players cfg file to do whatever you want to do.

Read full topic
